title: After a windows update, my FPS dropped to 47
body:
Before that it'd be a solid 110+

What do I do?

replies.body:
Having same problem. I always played borderless and had 200+ fps and now I'm stuck at 60 and my laptop freezes and even though all my video drivers are up-to-date and happened when I patched the client as well as updated.

I can't play league and vsync and everything is off. I don't know what to do and if I try to play a game, my laptop will freeze

You can try to roll back those windows updates and see if it resolves the issue instantly. Alternatively, you can work through our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), as it goes over the most common solutions for FPS problems.

Let me know if you continue to see issues.
